featured.text: Conversely, worry can give a person an ulcer, high blood pressure, or even a heart attack.
Others have pulled people in front of moving trains or saved them from attacks by wild animals.

other.text: A woman's heart attack caused the death of five people.
They appear to be attracted to electromagnetic fields and attack electrical insulation or wire connections.
The craze for hoops even resulted in dislocated backs and heart attacks, according to medical records.
They attacked a man with the smell of new clothing.
“Jack saved me from a heart attack,” he wrote.
Peanuts’ beloved grandfather has suffered a heart attack.
In the news recently was the story of a woman who died of a heart attack while driving her station wagon.
They defend themselves by attacking others.

definition.en_def: To take aggressive action against someone or something.
definition.example: The army planned to attack the enemy's base at dawn.
